description.brief: Base controller class that automatically associates joints with a JointState object

parameters.description: The frame name in the robot model to use for kinematics calculations (defaults to the last frame in the model)
If true, re-arrange the 'joints' parameter into a physically correct order according to the robot model
Optionally, the name of a force-torque sensor in the hardware interface
The reference frame of the force-torque sensor in the robot model
A time constant for the exponential decay of the commanded velocity, acceleration or torque if no new command is set
The maximum allowable change in command on any interface expressed in command units / second
